reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 537/05: PRESCRIBED CONTRACTS RE SECTION 78.4
reg_info.act_under: Ontario Energy Board Act, 1998   Loi de 1998 sur la Commission de l’énergie de l’Ontario

content.content: 1. (1) Subject to subsection (2), contracts that satisfy the following rules are prescribed contracts for the purpose of section 78.4 of the Act:   1. Contracts assumed by the OPA pursuant to a direction by the Minister made under subsection 25.32 (4) of the Electricity Act, 1998. 2. Contracts entered into by the OPA pursuant to a direction by the Minister made under subsection 25.32 (7) of the Electricity Act, 1998. O. Reg. 537/05, s. 1 (1). (2) Subsection (1) applies to contracts other than contracts with respect to output generated by units at generation facilities, contracts for ancillary services or contracts for both. O. Reg. 537/05, s. 1 (2).
content.raw_html:
1. (1) Subject to subsection (2), contracts that satisfy the following rules are prescribed contracts for the purpose of section 78.4 of the Act:

1. Contracts assumed by the OPA pursuant to a direction by the Minister made under subsection 25.32 (4) of the Electricity Act, 1998.

2. Contracts entered into by the OPA pursuant to a direction by the Minister made under subsection 25.32 (7) of the Electricity Act, 1998. O. Reg. 537/05, s. 1 (1).

(2) Subsection (1) applies to contracts other than contracts with respect to output generated by units at generation facilities, contracts for ancillary services or contracts for both. O. Reg. 537/05, s. 1 (2).
